title: 600 scientists oppose UK’s use of behavioral science to fight coronavirus
description: The UK government’s handling of the novel coronavirus pandemic has come under serious criticism, not just from citizens, but from leaders around the world. One of the reasons for this is because the government is using behavioral science to decide how to coor…
